title.rendered: Binance restricts unverified sub-accounts on Exchange Link program

content.rendered: Restricted accounts cannot place new orders in futures and margin trading but can reduce their positions.

excerpt.rendered: Restricted accounts cannot place new orders in futures and margin trading but can reduce their positions.
